definition: to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: Taking boat pass the Songhua river and saw the sun island.
sentences.chinese: 乘船渡過鬆花江，看到了太陽島。

sentences.english: Students in Hongshanhu and Kaisandao have to get to school by boat.
sentences.chinese: 紅山湖和開山島的學生得乘船去上演。

sentences.english: But from the Fishing Bridge you can take a boat excursion on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們可以從釣魚橋乘船遊覽黃石湖。

sentences.english: He crossed a lake in a canoe first then took a ship to sail on the canal.
sentences.chinese: 他先乘獨木舟渡過一個湖泊然後乘船在運河上航行。
我們乘船順泰晤士河而下。
他們乘船順尼羅河而下。

sentences.english: Wei power from outside the boat back to port, but being when you pick up the car more than even inserted knife killed.
sentences.chinese: 偉權自外乘船返港，可是取車時卻被人連插多刀殺害。

sentences.english: And she was beaming after a boat ride through the It's A Small World attraction.
sentences.chinese: 接着她又愉快的乘船穿過“小小世界”景點。

sentences.english: We took a ship by waterway to travel.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘船經水路去旅行。

sentences.english: We pushed off frow the shore and were soon out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘船駛離岸邊，不久就到了海上。

sentences.english: Xiaoxi will embark for dalian at midday.
sentences.chinese: 小西中午將乘船去大連。

sentences.english: How am I to cross to the other shore without taking a boat and rowing across the waters?
sentences.chinese: 我要怎樣跨到彼岸而不用乘船或者劃過水面？

sentences.english: Even if the militia battles dint no, also can by ship withdraw.
sentences.chinese: 即使陸軍作戰不力，也可以乘船撤回來。

sentences.english: I'll sail with you upon ships across the seas.
sentences.chinese: 現在我將會和你乘船渡海。

sentences.english: Do not fear the helm, the boat secure.
sentences.chinese: 把舵的不慌，乘船的穩當。

definition: (of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
land route/to go by surface transport
to charter a ship/to take a vessel on rent
